channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 周五，俄罗斯人开始在为期三天的总统选举中投票，在肆虐的乌克兰冲突进一步蔓延到俄罗斯境内之际，老牌领导人弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）将再次获得六年任期。
item.description:
Russians started voting on Friday in a three-day presidential election that is set to hand veteran leader Vladimir Putin another six-year term as the raging conflict in Ukraine spreads further into Russian territory.https://t.co/4NmnbcH53h

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 日本最大的工会周五表示，其初步数据创下了自 1991 年以来的最高工资涨幅，这激起了人们对日本央行最终将放弃其异常超宽松货币政策的猜测。
item.description:
Japan's largest trade union said Friday it had secured the highest wage hikes since 1991 in preliminary data that stokes speculation the central bank will finally shift away from its outlier ultra-loose monetary policy.https://t.co/Wehwhs0kZR

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：美国众议院通过一项法案，迫使视频共享应用程序 TikTok 与其中国母公司断绝关系，否则将在美国被禁用，此后中美之间爆发了一场争论。
item.description:
VIDEO: A spat has erupted between the US and China after the American House of Representatives passed a bill forcing the video-sharing app TikTok to sever ties with its Chinese parent company or be banned in the United States. pic.twitter.com/jbUaZhlqT6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 日本两大汽车公司日产和本田周五表示，它们正在探索建立电动汽车战略合作伙伴关系，以应对汽车行业 "百年一遇 "的大变革。
item.description:
Japanese arch-rivals Nissan and Honda said Friday they were exploring a strategic partnership in electric vehicles to face up to a "once-in-a-century" upheaval in the car industry.https://t.co/HBKSASW0Y5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：在阿富汗，一半人口生活在贫困之中，失业男子在东北部山区靠采金过着危险的生活。
item.description:
VIDEO: In Afghanistan, where half the population live in poverty, unemployed men try their luck carving out a dangerous living as gold miners in the northeastern mountains. pic.twitter.com/to854w3YcW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 多年来，欧盟在波斯尼亚加入欧盟的问题上时冷时热，但随着加入欧盟的谈判最终迫在眉睫，波斯尼亚的耐心可能会得到回报。
item.description:
Bosnia has trodden a long and winding road to eventual European Union membership after years of seeing the bloc blow hot and cold on the issue, but its patience could be rewarded as accession talks finally loom.https://t.co/towZntUNKT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频每年，圣地亚哥-夏利钦特拉的当地人都会用歌声、舞蹈和礼物来庆祝 "唐-戈约 "的 "生日"，他们亲切地称呼波波卡特佩特火山为 "唐-戈约"。
item.description:
VIDEO: Each year, locals from Santiago Xalitzintla celebrate the "birthday" of "Don Goyo", as they affectionately call the Popocatepetl volcano, with songs, dance and gifts. pic.twitter.com/p1f9nMZDQC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：雷宾-皮什蒂万（Rebin Pishtiwan）蜷缩在一辆面包车的后座上，仔细地扫描着一页又一页泛黄的纸张，这是库尔德斯坦艺术与文化中心（KCAC）发起的一个项目的一部分，该项目旨在将有可能永远消失的库尔德历史文献数字化。
item.description:
VIDEO: Huddled in the back of a van, Rebin Pishtiwan carefully scans one yellowed page after another, as part of a project launched by the Kurdistan Centre for Art and Culture (KCAC) to digitise historic Kurdish texts at risk of disappearing forever. pic.twitter.com/GU84WfN3pC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 香港天主教会称，根据新的国家安全法，忏悔将继续保密。新法规定，任何人如果知道有人将犯下叛国罪，但没有向警方报告，将被判处监禁。
item.description:
Catholic Church in Hong Kong says confessions will remain secret under new national security law.

The new law proposes jail terms for any person who knows that someone will commit treason but fails to report it to the policehttps://t.co/lpvFvfFiJF pic.twitter.com/G0WV3iw48w

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 艺术与技术相结合"，纽约最新的博物馆承诺以 "身临其境的感官 "体验重塑艺术形式。美世实验室艺术与技术博物馆展出了画家、雕塑家、声光设计师罗伊-纳克姆的作品。
item.description:
'Art meets technology'

New York's latest museum is promising to reinvent the format with an "immersive and sensory" experience. The Mercer Labs Museum of Art and Technology features works by Roy Nachum, a painter, sculptor and sound and light designerhttps://t.co/gCwmPD4YoR pic.twitter.com/lS8UzN7PVX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: @AFPs贾斯汀-塔利斯（Justin Tallis）拍摄了 "总统 "号皇家海军陆战队员在一名男看守的带领下穿过伦敦塔，运送一桶港口货物，这是 "警员会费"（Constable's Dues）的一部分。
item.description:
Port duties.@AFPs Justin Tallis photographs Royal Marines from HMS President, led by a Yeomen Warder, marching through the Tower of London to deliver a barrel of port, as part of the Constable's Dues.

The historic ceremony traces back to the 14th century and is related to the… pic.twitter.com/qUEz9L5fF6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 鲨鱼并不是你想象中的海洋怪兽。鲨鱼袭击事件极为罕见--科学家们希望更多人了解这一事实，尤其是在鲨鱼数量不断减少、亟需保护的情况下。
item.description:
Sharks are not the sea monsters you imagine.

Shark attacks are exceedingly rare -- a fact scientists wish more people knew, especially amid declining shark populations desperately in need of conservationhttps://t.co/uqiWsbXfFz pic.twitter.com/yDsp4GqtL8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 菲律宾单身母亲玛丽-安-爱德华特（Mary Ann Eduarte）推迟了乳腺癌化疗，转而服用社交媒体上虚假宣传的保健品。 癌症扩散了。@AFP数字调查记者发现，在社交媒体上出现了大量......
item.description:
Medical misinformation.

Filipino single mother Mary Ann Eduarte delayed chemotherapy for her breast cancer and instead took supplements falsely promoted on social media as cures. The cancer spread.@AFP digital investigation journalists have seen an explosion in the volume of… pic.twitter.com/ok9mXnNXvt

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 鲸鱼的尾巴科学家追踪座头鲸独特的 "指纹 "最近的一项尾部识别研究表明，北太平洋的座头鲸数量在不到十年的时间里锐减了 20%--这可能是由于海洋热浪造成的饥饿所致
item.description:
Whale of a tail: Scientists track unique humpback 'fingerprint'

A recent study of tail identification showed the number of humpback whales in the North Pacific plummeted 20% in less than a decade - possibly due to starvation because of marine heat waveshttps://t.co/p561J39wXX pic.twitter.com/AJRjA44hgb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 日本棒球巨星大谷翔平周五发布了第一张新婚妻子的照片。
item.description:
Japanese baseball superstar Shohei Ohtani on Friday posted the first picture of his new wife, who was quickly identified online as a former basketball player named Mamiko Tanakahttps://t.co/lbZ6WPUYsl pic.twitter.com/QDRz3MF8iA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 研究显示，神经系统疾病（如中风、偏头痛和痴呆症）已超越心脏病，成为全球健康不良的主要原因
item.description:
Nervous system disorders -- such as strokes, migraines and dementia -- have surged past heart disease to become the leading cause of ill health worldwide, study showshttps://t.co/Z2MH5IzGcB pic.twitter.com/X6WYxG2Zmq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 一名@法新社记者在现场看到了几具尸体和中弹者。
item.description:
Gaza's Hamas-run health ministry says Israeli fire killed 20 people and wounded 155 waiting for aid.

An @AFP journalist on the scene saw several bodies and people who had been shot.

The Israeli military denies it opened fire on the crowd of Gazans https://t.co/0zM6IwS7uZ pic.twitter.com/YuXSoi7emM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频： 海地的帮派暴力：是什么引发了这场危机？帮派暴力使海地陷入混乱。在总理阿里埃勒-亨利（Ariel Henry）辞职后，相关各方正试图建立一个过渡管理机构，直到举行选举为止。控制海地的帮派...
item.description:
VIDEO: Gang violence in Haiti: What sparked the crisis?

Gang violence has plunged Haiti into chaos. After the resignation of Prime Minister Ariel Henry, stakeholders are attempting to establish a transitional governing body until elections can be held. The gangs that control… pic.twitter.com/T6V2zJtuR4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 墨西哥艺术家将特斯拉压在巨大的石头脑袋下。这不是一起意外事故的现场，而是一件艺术品--创作者说他想向埃隆-马斯克挑衅
item.description:
Mexican artist crushes Tesla under giant stone head.

It's not the scene of a freak accident, but a piece of art -- whose creator says he wants to provoke Elon Muskhttps://t.co/f0AQOGNfPt pic.twitter.com/vg1hLu2QIT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频 在巴米扬省的山坡上，选手们轮番从雪山上飞驰而下，尽管失去了赞助商和在 2021 年塔利班接管阿富汗后离开该国的著名滑雪运动员，但他们仍团结一致，使滑雪运动在阿富汗得以继续🇦🇫 ⛷️。
item.description:
VIDEO Slopeside in Bamiyan province, rivals cheer each other on as they take turns racing down the snowy mountainside, united in keeping skiing alive in Afghanistan despite the loss of sponsors and prominent skiers who left the country after the 2021 Taliban takeover
🇦🇫 ⛷️ pic.twitter.com/RMvOHTa0QZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: #塞内加尔反对派领导人松科和法耶获释：律师
item.description:
#BREAKING Senegal opposition leaders Sonko, Faye released from prison: lawyer pic.twitter.com/lHtDgPRJDe

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 卫冕冠军卡洛斯-阿尔卡拉斯在印第安维尔斯站四分之一决赛中对阵亚历山大-兹维列夫的比赛周四突然中断，因为蜂群将球员们赶出了体育场球场🎾 🐝 ⤵️。
item.description:
Very bee-zarre.
Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz's quarter-final clash with Alexander Zverev at Indian Wells was halted abruptly Thursday as swarming bees drove the players from Stadium Court
🎾 🐝 ⤵️https://t.co/zMIykPUbAR pic.twitter.com/hytly5VrDK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 周四，利物浦在 14 分钟内连进四球，以 6-1 的比分大胜布拉格斯巴达，晋级欧洲联赛四分之一决赛，德甲领头羊拜耳勒沃库森在补时阶段连进两球，淘汰卡拉巴赫 ⤵️。
item.description:
⚽Liverpool scored four times inside 14 minutes in a 6-1 thrashing of Sparta Prague on Thursday to reach the quarter-finals of the Europa League, as Bundesliga leaders Bayer Leverkusen needed two stoppage-time goals to eliminate Qarabag ⤵️https://t.co/Nvx3ACbxdY pic.twitter.com/Zn1La7eYBw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）周四参观了一家堕胎诊所，强调了生殖权利这一关键的选举议题，据信这是美国总统或副总统首次进行此类访问🇺🇸。
item.description:
US Vice President Kamala Harris toured an abortion clinic Thursday, highlighting the key election issue of reproductive rights in what is believed to be the first such visit by a president or vice president
🇺🇸 https://t.co/VfQr61hMFL pic.twitter.com/FQ4nCMdQ2g

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: Ratadoobie？新奥尔良警方在收缴大麻时，无法阻止警局总部内的一些人吸食没收的大麻。他们遇到麻烦的不是警察，而是在大楼里出没多年的老鼠🇺🇸 🌿 🐀
item.description:
Ratadoobie? As New Orleans police seize marijuana, they can't stop some inside department headquarters from consuming the confiscated stash. It's not officers they're having trouble with, but rather rats that have infested the building for years
🇺🇸 🌿 🐀 https://t.co/lNkeW8KzF9 pic.twitter.com/4AZUIgobTk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: #哈马斯卫生部称以色列向等待援助的加沙人开火造成 11 人死亡
item.description:
#BREAKING Hamas health ministry says Israeli fire on Gazans waiting for aid kills 11 pic.twitter.com/TP1khHUyKJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

VIDEO A spat has erupted between Washington and Beijing after the US House of Representatives passed a bill that would force video-sharing app TikTok to sever ties with its Chinese parent company or be banned in the United States

item.title: 视频：巴勒斯坦人在加沙北部拜特拉希耶争相领取飞机空投的援助物资，严峻的人道主义危机已将加沙地带大部分地区推向饥饿的边缘 @AFPTV
item.description:
VIDEO Palestinians rush to collect aid airdropped by a plane in Beit Lahia, in northern Gaza, amid a gruelling humanitarian crisis that has pushed much of the strip to the brink of starvation @AFPTV pic.twitter.com/SslCbNbpgY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024

item.title: 视频：缅甸现在是世界上最大的海洛因生产国，对于冲突和政变频发的缅甸的许多农民来说，种植罂粟已成为他们在社会和经济动荡中维持生计的唯一途径。提取的鸦片树脂被提炼成海洛因，销往世界市场📹🇲🇲。
item.description:
VIDEO For many farmers in conflict- and coup-riven Myanmar, now the world's biggest heroin producer, poppy farming has become their only way of making ends meet amid social and economic turmoil. The extracted opium resin is refined into heroin destined for the world market
📹 🇲🇲 pic.twitter.com/cxLmUiYMXi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 14, 2024
